S04n394:2: valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma |
S04n394:3: dṛṣṭvā ca sāntaḥpuraparivāraiḥ sārdhamanekairasuraśatasahasraiḥ kubjavāmanakādibhiḥ sahasraparivārairgatvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādayornipatyedamudānayati sma–
S04n394:4: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca |
S04n394:5: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham || 1 ||
S04n394:7: adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ |
S04n394:10: tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ |
S04n394:18: valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha– api ca |
S04n394:21: pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ saṃsāraduṣṭavārtānāṃ trātā bhava |
S04n394:25: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ,
S04n394:27: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante,
S04n394:30: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ ||
S04n394:31: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha-ye mahārāja sattvānāmantike avihiṃsācittamutpādayanti,
S04n394:34: na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti |
S04n394:40: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām,
S04n394:41: asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati,
S04n394:49: mitābhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti |
S04n394:52: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,
S04n394:54: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n394:56: te'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n394:58: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum |
S04n394:59: na tu kulaputra śakyaṃ mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n394:60: tadyathāpi nama kulaputra caturṣu mahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaste sarve kṛṣikarmānte udyuktā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n394:65: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ kuryāt |
S04n394:68: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n394:69: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi adhastādupagataḥ ūrdhveṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa ca |
S04n394:72: ye caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ puruṣadārakadārikāste ca sarve lekhakā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n394:75: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n394:76: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra lekhakāḥ sarve te daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ paryāpannāḥ |
S04n394:77: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n394:78: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra gaṅgāyā nadyā vālukāsamudrasya ca śakyaṃ mayā ekaikaṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
S04n394:79: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n394:80: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā sarvamaturāsrāṃ(?)
S04n394:82: na śakyaṃ mayā kulaputra piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum ||
S04n394:83: athe balisurendraḥ idaṃ ca tasya bhagavato'
S04n394:84: valokiteśvarasyāntikātpiṇḍapātrakuśalabhūtasya sukṣetrāvarūḍhabījapātrabhūtasya nirdeśyamānasya tatsarvamanumodya sāśrudurdinavadano gadgadakaṇṭhaḥ bāṣpaparipūrṇa ucchvasan avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-kīdṛśaṃ mayā bhagavan balinā karma kṛtaṃ dānaṃ dattam,
S04n394:90: yadā mayā ca bhagavan tairthikadṛṣṭiparyāpannena mānagrastamānasena ca yajñaṃ yajatā mahādānasamucchrayaṃ kartumārabdham,
S04n394:91: tadā me tatra yajñe vāmanakarūpeṇa yācanako hiṃsraḥ samāgataḥ |
S04n394:92: tasya me maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmāni ratnābharaṇāni hyaśvarathādīni muktvā ratnakavacāni marakatapralambitāni cāmarapralambitāni muktāhārāṇi muktikājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni muktikākalāpajālāṅgulīkāni sauvarṇaghaṇṭikārūpyanibaddhāni raṇaraṇāyamānāni, (anyāni ca)
S04n394:93: kapilāsahasrāṇi rūpyapādāni sauvarṇaśṛṅgāni muktājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni arghapātrasamāyuktāni nānāvicitraghaṇṭāratnasamāyuktāni,
S04n394:95: kumārīṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi paramayā gurvaruṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ nānāvicitrāṇāṃ kanyālakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtānāṃ paramarūpaśobhamānāmapsarasāmapi pratispardhinīnāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmaparikṣepikāṇāṃ keyūrakaṭakanūpurakaṭimekhalāhastottaryā karṇapṛṣṭhottaryā hastāṅgulīyasamāyuktānāṃ sarasarāyamāṇamālāsamāyuktānāṃ nānāraṅgoparaktavastraprāvṛtānām, (anyāni)
S04n394:101: anekāni suvarṇarūpyamayāni daṇḍāni ratnasaṃyuktāni satataṃ vyavasthāpitāni |
S04n394:105: tasmin sa mayā rājñā śatasahasrān saṃnipatitān brāhmaṇaśatasahasraṃ saṃnipatitam |
S04n394:107: tadāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ sthānasthitānāṃ yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannaḥ |
S04n394:110: etatpaurvikaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi-kṣātriyabhāryāṇāṃ gurviṇīnāṃ yāvaddhṛdayaṃ sphuṭayitvā kumārakumārikā jīvitādvayaparopitāḥ |
S04n394:111: tataste ca mahākṣatriyāḥ sarve mayā haḍanigaḍabandhanairbaddhāḥ |
S04n394:112: nītvā tāmraguhāyāmanekāni kṣatriyaśatasahasrāṇi pañcabandhanabaddhāni kṛtvā sthāpitāni pañcapāṇḍavaprabhṛtīni |
S04n394:113: tasyāmeva yakṣaguhāyāmupayamāni kīlakāni śṛṅkhalāsamāyuktāni teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hastapādāni baddhvā sthāpitāni |
S04n394:123: ekaikadvāre pañca pañca śatāni kapāṭāni yantrasamāyuktāni |
S04n394:131: rūpaṃ kṛtvā dine dine mṛgapakṣyādinā nānājanturūpeṇa |
S04n394:134: tadātra me daśarathaputreṇāvatāraprekṣiṇā gatvā tena dvārasthāpitāḥ sapta parvatā utpāṭitāḥ |
S04n394:135: utpāṭayitvā laghunīvānyapradeśe chorayitvā uccaiḥśabdena teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāmārocayati sma yudhiṣṭhiranakulasahadevabhīmasenārjunakauravādibhiḥ |
S04n394:136: anye rājānaḥ śabdamanuśrutaṃ śrutvā samāśvāsya svasthakāyā vyavasthitāḥ |
S04n394:139: tena mahāvīryeṇa puruṣeṇa sarvāṇi tāni dvārāṇi bhagnāni |
S04n394:142: dṛṣṭvā ca nārāyaṇaṃ sarve te parasparaṃ vicintayanti- atha balirasurendro mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ?
S04n394:145: atha te kathayanti-varamasmākaṃ saṃgrāmabhūmīmaraṇaṃ na tu bandhanabaddhānāṃ maraṇam |
S04n394:150: atha te rājānaḥ sarve svakaṃ svakaṃ gṛhaṃ gatāḥ |
S04n394:152: yadā te rathaṃ sajjīkurvanti mahārhāṇi śastrāṇi,
S04n394:153: tadā daśarathaputreṇa vāmanakarūpamabhinirmāya mṛgājinenottarya veṇudaṇḍamupagṛhya pīṭhikāmupagṛhya saṃprasthito matsakāśam |
S04n394:175: śukra uvāca- jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā |
S04n394:177: atha nārāyaṇena vicintya avaśyaṃ dānasya vipratisāraṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n394:185: sa pratigrahaṃ tasyopagṛhya svastimupavadyānugṛhītaṃ tena tilapānīyasuvarṇasahitam |
S04n394:187: atha śukro balimetadavocat-rājan kathitaṃ mayā kālapuruṣa eṣa praviṣṭaḥ |
S04n394:188: na ca tvayā pramāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vacanam |
S04n394:195: kiṃ kṛtya(?) svahastena mayā viṣaṃ bhakṣitam |
S04n394:198: tadā sa kathayati-tṛtīyasya padaṃ na saṃvidyate |
S04n394:201: atha nārāyaṇastametadavocat-yatrāhaṃ sthāpayāmi tatra tvayā sthātavyam |
S04n394:202: atha sa balirasurendrastametadavocat-yādṛśaṃ tvayājñaptaṃ tādṛśaṃ karomyaham |
S04n394:208: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ |
S04n394:209: tāni ca suvarṇamayāni siṃhāsanāni divyāni cchatrāṇyupānahāni ratnapariveṣṭitāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni |
S04n394:211: atha sa balirasurendro yajñabhūmerniṣkrāntaḥ śarīracintāmāpede-dātā balirudārayajñamupāsya |
S04n394:214: yathaiva kartā sartā sa nītvā pātālamupasthāpitaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ |
S04n394:215: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā bhagavan-bhūtapūrvaṃ kurukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ tasyaitatkarmaphalamanubhavāmi |
S04n394:218: athe balistaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ stotraviśeṣaiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ- trāṇaṃ bhavāhi śubhapadmahasta |
S04n394:240: mucyante te kārasūtrai rauravopapanneṣu avīcyupapanneṣu pretanagaropapanneṣu ye tava nāmadheyamanusmaranti |
S04n394:245: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro balerindrasya vyākaraṇamanuprayacchati sma-bhaviṣyasi tvamasurendra śrīrnāma tathāgato'
S04n394:246: rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n394:248: tatra tava buddhakṣetre na rāgaśabdo na dveṣaśabdo na mohaśabdo bhaviṣyati |
S04n394:251: śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramupanāmitaṃ maulīkuṇḍalaṃ ca nānāratnasamuccitamupanāmitaṃ ca ||
S04n394:252: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro dharmadeśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ- śṛṇu mahārāja |
S04n394:253: nitye dhruve śāśvate mānuṣyake ye cintayanti satataparigrahaṃ mahābhogānyanuvicintayanti dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyān,
S04n394:256: ajñānāste sattvā ye putradāradārikāmanuvicintayanti bhāryāṃ mātāpitarau |
S04n394:262: ye ca mahārhā vṛkṣāstān pradīptān saprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān paśyanti |
S04n394:265: tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kṣuradhāropacite mahāpathe pādā viśīryante |
S04n394:270: tataḥ kṣuradhāropacitānmahāpathādavatīrya yatra ṣoḍaśāṅgulipramāṇāni kaṇṭakāni tatrānīyate,
S04n394:271: tata ekaikapāde pañca pañcaśatāni kaṇṭakāni praviśanti |
S04n394:277: na ca tvayā kvaciddānāni dīyamānāni dṛṣṭvānumoditāni |
S04n394:278: na ca tvayā kvacit pradeśe stūpabimbāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtāni |
S04n394:283: athe te yamapuruṣā nītvā kālasūtre mahānarake kṣipanti |
S04n394:284: śikṣā caikaikaśaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
S04n394:285: dvitīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
S04n394:286: tṛtīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati |
S04n394:287: yadā kalaṃ na kurvanti tadāgnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti |
S04n394:292: kaṇṭhamapi tālumapi hṛdayamapi yantravatkalā nigaḍāyamānā sarvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ dahyante |
S04n394:293: evameva hā rājan na kaścit trātā bhaviṣyati paraloke |
S04n394:294: tasmāttarhi taṃ mahārāja yatnena puṇyaṃ kartavyam |
S04n394:295: evaṃ sānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā ca taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha-apramattena bhavitavyam,
S04n394:302: mamāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvato niravaśeṣāṇi pāpaskandhāni na ca supariśuddhāni |
S04n394:305: tatra ca tava saptaratnamayaṃ padmāsanaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n394:307: mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt imaṃ sarvaduḥkhapāpaskandhaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ sarvadurgatisādhanaṃ anantamaṇimahāpuṇyanirdeśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānaṃ sūtraratnarājaṃ tvaṃ śroṣyasi,
S04n394:308: śrutvā ca tatraiva vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyase anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n394:311: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya ca balerasurendrasya imaṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhanaṃ bodhisattvālaṃkārakāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma dharmālokaṃ deśayitvā taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendraṃ samāśvāsya idamavocat-gamiṣyāmyaham |
